text: hey <@U6GNQ7JBU> <@U6W3H6YN8> This seems to be popping up again :confused:
So to confirm, updates you are making using local dev or in the design manager are not reflecting on live content?

Hey <@U6W3H6YN8> That is correct. I haven't made many edits within the design manager to test, but it seems like the changes I'm making locally (with `watch` running) are uploading as expected, but the displayed page does not reflect the edits
Would you mind sending a DM to Matt and I with the file being changed and a live page where it can not be seen?

yeah -- I'm working on getting that for you. It does seem like some of the edits have resolved to show as expected, but there was a pretty sizeable window between updates -- so pretty heavy lag. Sending a DM now
Thanks <@UEC65BQV8> the video was super helpful. I'm going to follow <@U22VBL87M> workflow using sandbox for dev + github Actions for production.
Really impressive the amount of work that's gone into improving the developer experience.
<@UFL9XN2DQ> you bet! i am just trying to pull together all the work and share the good news. People can build amazing things but if nobody knows how to find them or use them...
holler if you have questions. I will try to help where I can
and keep us updated how it goes!
Thanks for chiming in <@UEC65BQV8>! We are still working on improving the staging/previewing experience, so keep your :eyes: out for updates to come in the future.
The boilerplate and action setup can be found here! <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate>
I am trying to remove all my files in the desgin manager via npx hs remove, is this possible?
I tried using: npx hs remove --portal=DEV /
when you delete a file while its being watched localy it wil also be deleted in the DM
